title: Magic Flute
creator_credit: Gayle Thomas, Derek Lamb and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Lyrical animation of the magical events which occur when various children play a flute, evoking both pleasant scenes of flowers and unpleasant ones of witches and bats, according to the personality of the child. Sound film without words. (Awards: Palo Alto; Columbus)
